content: the woodside washcloth the woodside washcloth is a lovely simple but textured washcloth or dishcloth perfect for the shower bath or sink easy to knit up and fun to work on this washcloth is fun and interesting enough to want to work up again and again i knit up my sample in a bit over an hour and had tons of fun with it with the ribbed texture and a bit of detail this pattern is sure to become one of your favorites the woodside washcloth simplestitchesdesigns 2025 1 yarn i used hobby lobby i love this cotton for my sample you can use any worsted weight cotton you would like for this washcloth you ll need around 60 - 70 yards of it or less for this project needles the needles i used were us 6 circular knitting needles you don t at all have to use circular needles for this project straight needles work just fine gauge 19 sts and 21 row over 4 in the ribbed pattern for this washcloth the gauge doesn t really matter at all for this project unless you d like your washcloth to be the exact same size as mine finished size 6 5 by 6 square this will differ depending on gauge yarn and needles washcloth cast on 33 sts using your preferred method of choice for casting on knit 4 row row 1 rs knit all sts row 2 ws knit 3 *purl 1 knit 1* repeat from * to * to 4 sts before end purl 1 knit 3 row 3 rs knit 3 *knit 1 purl 1* repeat from * to * to 4 sts before end knit 4 row 4 ws knit 3 *purl 1 knit 1* repeat from * to * to 4 sts before end purl 1 knit 3 row 5 rs knit 3 *knit 1 purl 1* repeat from * to * to 4 sts before end knit 4 row 6 ws knit 3 *purl 1 knit 1* repeat from * to * to 4 sts before end purl 1 knit 3 repeat these last six row 5 more times for a total of 6 ribbed sections the woodside washcloth simplestitchesdesigns 2025 2 border knit 4 row bind off all sts using your preferred method of choice and weave in all yarn ends lightly block if desired definitely not a crucial step at all thank you so much for choosing to follow one of my pattern designs if in need please feel free to contact lilabuczynski on ravelry or lila buczynski@outlook com for any questions or help i will answer as quickly as possible abbreviations rs right side of your project ws wrong side of your project sts stitches the woodside washcloth simplestitchesdesigns 2025 3
